metadata.title: CVE-2024-35984 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i2c: smbus: fix NULL function pointer dereferenceBaruch reported an OOPS when using the designware controller as targetonly. Target-only modes break the assumption of one transfer functionalways being available. Fix this by always checking the pointer in__i2c_transfer.[wsa: dropped the simplification in core-smbus to avoid theoreticalregressions]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
